title: Band, early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: punto in aria needle lace
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border composed of stylized heart-shaped forms. Taken from design by PARASOLE in 1597.
